stick.roomDescription: a weathered stick lying on the ground
stick.inventoryDescription: A rough wooden stick, light and easy to swing.

pint.inventoryDescription: A warm pint of beer sloshing gently in the glass.

engine oil.roomDescription: a dusty bottle of engine oil resting nearby
engine oil.inventoryDescription: A bottle of thick engine oil, still sealed and usable.

nuts.roomDescription: a small pile of metal nuts scattered on the floor
nuts.inventoryDescription: A handful of sturdy metal nuts, all different sizes.

soggy match.roomDescription: a soggy match stick lying uselessly on the ground
soggy match.inventoryDescription: A damp match stick that looks like it will never light.

wheels.roomDescription: a pair of loose wheels propped up against something
wheels.inventoryDescription: A set of wheels in decent condition, ready to be fitted.

headlights.roomDescription: a set of old headlights placed down carelessly
headlights.inventoryDescription: A pair of scratched but working headlights.

keys.roomDescription: a set of keys glinting faintly where they were dropped
keys.inventoryDescription: A small metal keyring holding several worn keys.

spark plug.roomDescription: a spark plug tossed aside on the ground
spark plug.inventoryDescription: A slightly used spark plug that still looks functional.

drink voucher.roomDescription: a crumpled drink voucher lying on the floor
drink voucher.inventoryDescription: A slightly torn voucher guaranteeing one free drink at the pub.
